summary:
Dozen Different Armor Styles To Choose From...Now Patched and Compatible is Armory now.
Updated to Version 8.1
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00FF00][size=4][b][/b][/size][/color][/center][center][/center][center][center][/center][/center][line][center][img]http://i61.tinypic.com/e67s68.jpg[/img][/center][b][size=5]
[b][center][color=#ffff00][size=5]V[/size][/color][color=#00ff00][size=6]8.1[/size][/color][/center][/b][/size][/b][quote][i][color=#ffffff]"The Reclamations are the True Tribunal... the daedra that [url=#]consecrate[/url] the Dunmer people: Azura, Mephala and Boethia. We call them the True Tribunal because they have [url=#]reclaimed[/url] their place in our hearts from the false Tribunal that came before. -- "Elder Othreloth
[/color]
[/i][/quote][center][b][size=5][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000]Fully Compatible[/color][/font][/b] [/size][/b][/center]with everything (literally) including :
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?]Alternate Start - Live Another Life
[/url]Author [color=#ffff00][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/684492/?]Arthmoor[/url] [/color]forgot to update this in his readme file SO no worries....
[b][color=#ffff00][size=3]Optimization See Bottom
[/size][/color][/b][line]
[center][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][b]Main File[/b] [b]Features:[/b][/color]
[/font][/center]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=3]
[/size][/color][list=1]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=3][*][size=3]Different Aspects of High Ordinator Reclamtion Armor.[/size]
[*][size=3]Eno Hlaalu's Robes! [/size]
[/size][/color][/list][line] 
[b][size=3][color=#ffff00][center]Robes Location:[/center][/color][/size][/b][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Eno's Robes and gloves Can be found in same location as the Ebony Blade.[/size][/color]
[line]
[center][color=#00ff00][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]ADDON ARMOR SET FOUND HERE: [/size][/font][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70328/?]Vaermina Armor Reclamation Addon

[/url][color=#ff7700][size=5]NEW MOD UNHIDDEN AND FIXED HERE --->
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52504/?]FIXED HOUSE DRES ARMOR[/url]
[img]http://i59.tinypic.com/1pv1hd.png[/img][/size][/color][/center][b][font=Comic Sans MS][line]
[color=#ffff00][size=6]Main Reclamtion Armor(S)[/size][/color][/font][/b]
[center][size=3][b][color=#ff0000]Require:[/color][/b] [/size][color=#f4f4f4]Skyrim Only as of Now[/color][/center]
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/dab3/alp437lqzbkyv246g.jpg[/img]
[color=#f4f4f4]1. [/color][color=#ffff00]Azurian[/color][color=#f4f4f4] - M/F ..same as ebony armor.[center][/center][/color]
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/db5e/4kdcno3vndk14836g.jpg[/img]
[color=#f4f4f4]2. [/color][color=#ffff00]Snake Mount[/color][color=#f4f4f4] - M/F ..same as Orcish armor.[/color]

[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/97b7/kk0dho0uodrr5nz6g.jpg[/img]
[color=#f4f4f4]3. [/color][color=#ffff00]Webspinner[/color][color=#f4f4f4] - M/F ..same as Elven armor.[/color]

[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/72cc/al94ck29u2iyy4i6g.jpg[/img]
[color=#f4f4f4]4. [/color][color=#ffff00]Ritual[/color][color=#f4f4f4] - M/F ..same as daedric[/color]

[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/40e2/wrhwwe9ms417w6k6g.jpg[/img]
[color=#f4f4f4]5. [/color][color=#ffff00]Extra[/color][color=#f4f4f4] - Eno Hlaalu Robes - M/F[/color][color=#ff6600] [/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]Reclamtion(s) -info 
Azura, Boethiah, Mephala.[/color]

[b][color=#00ffff][size=5][center][/center][/size][/color][/b][center][b][size=5][color=#ffff00]Optional Ritual Armor[/color][/size][/b][color=#ff6600] [/color]

[/b][/size]

[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/c8ad/7jnnb0yhxybgtzc6g.jpg[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000]REPLACES [/color]1st Ritual Version[/b][color=#ff6600] [/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]Skaera75 Morrowind Style[/color]

[center][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/6cb7/b3yvdminvkhjo446g.jpg[/img][/center]
[color=#ffff00]Tribunal:[/color][color=#f4f4f4] Standalone M/F same as Steel Plate[/color]
[color=#ff0000][b][i][center]HELMET NOT FOR CATS AND LIZARDS![/center][/i][/b][/color]


[center][b][size=5][color=#ffff00]Optional House of Troubles Armor(s)[/color][/size][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000][size=3][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000][size=3][/size][/color][/b][center][b][color=#ff0000][size=3]Require:[/size][/color][/b] [color=#f4f4f4]Only Skyrim[/color][/center]

[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/8765/kdziuheo1l8pujn6g.jpg[/img]

[/color][color=#f4f4f4]Two Versions Red or Black[/color]
[color=#ff6600] [/color]
[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/0866/3m8kaa742108a5d6g.jpg[/img]

[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/6a10/yj0el9f22mzh8iz6g.jpg[/img]
[color=#f4f4f4]9. [/color][color=#ffff00]Pariah/Outcast[/color][color=#f4f4f4] - M ..same as orcish armor[/color]

[img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/d1a6/eda4ooo58b9obd36g.jpg[/img]
[color=#f4f4f4]10. [/color][color=#ffff00]Madness & Royal Mad Armor[/color][color=#f4f4f4] - M ..same as companion armor[/color][/center]
[center][color=#f4f4f4][/color][/center][color=#f4f4f4][/color][/center][center][color=#f4f4f4]

House of Troubles - info
[/color][color=#f4f4f4]Molag Bal, Malacath, Sheogorath, Mehrunes Dagon.
[/color]

files.name: Patched Main file Needs only Skyrim
files.fileName: Patched Main file Needs only Skyrim-52502-8.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Corrected Pauldrons to be straightened, before were at angle to the left.
Re-did Main file textures from png's to dxt5 textures for balanced quality without lagging.
Re-did Normal Maps on all Main file armors now lighting is how it should have been.
Re-did Esp file to NO LONGER rely on DLC2 ESM file.
Added two more optional files Azura Hands Armor and Tribunal Royal Armor 4E
